tool_description: Number of the day, base and numeral conversions, number facts and more.
name: Numbers
title: Numbers

api_list.name: /numbers/base/octal
api_list.description: Convert a given number to octal

optional_parameters.name: from
optional_parameters.description: Base of the supplied number (Optional base 10 assumed by default)

api_list.name: /numbers/currency
api_list.description: Spells out the number as a currency

api_list.name: /numbers/ordinal
api_list.description: Get the ordinal of the given number

api_list.name: /numbers/cardinal
api_list.description: Get the cardinal of the given number

api_list.name: /numbers/prime/is-prime
api_list.description: Checks whether a given number is a known prime number or not.

api_list.name: /numbers/pi
api_list.description: Get digits of pi (Ï€)

api_list.name: /numbers/base/hex
api_list.description: Convert a given number to hexadecimal

optional_parameters.name: from
optional_parameters.description: Base of the supplied number (Optional base 10 assumed by default)

api_list.name: /numbers/random
api_list.description: Generate random number(s)

optional_parameters.name: total
optional_parameters.description: Total number of random numbers to generate. Defaults to 1

optional_parameters.name: min
optional_parameters.description: Minimum Number value in the range

api_list.name: /numbers/prime/is-mersenne-prime
api_list.description: Checks whether a given number is a known mersenne prime number or not.

api_list.name: /numbers/prime/is-pell-prime
api_list.description: Checks whether a given number is a known pell prime number or not.

api_list.name: /numbers/fact
api_list.description: Get a random fact about a number

api_list.name: /numbers/nod
api_list.description: Get the number of the day for current day
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://numbers7.p.rapidapi.com/numbers/nod"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "numbers7.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://numbers7.p.rapidapi.com/numbers/nod"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "numbers7.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /numbers/prime/factors
api_list.description: Get the prime factors of a given number.

api_list.name: /numbers/numeral/chinese
api_list.description: Convert base 10 representation of a given number to chinese numeral.

api_list.name: /numbers/base/binary
api_list.description: Convert a given number to binary

optional_parameters.name: from
optional_parameters.description: Base of the supplied number (Optional base 10 assumed by default)

api_list.name: /numbers/prime/is-partition-prime
api_list.description: Checks whether a given number is a known partition prime number or not.

api_list.name: /numbers/numeral/roman
api_list.description: Convert base 10 representation of a given number to roman numeral.

api_list.name: /numbers/numeral/egyptian
api_list.description: Convert base 10 representation of a given number to egyptian numeral.

api_list.name: /numbers/prime/is-fibonacci-prime
api_list.description: Checks whether a given number is a known fibonacci prime number or not.

api_list.name: /numbers/base
api_list.description: Convert a given number from one base to another base

required_parameters.name: number
required_parameters.description: Number to convert to the target base

optional_parameters.name: from
optional_parameters.description: Base of the supplied number (Optional base 10 assumed by default)

api_list.name: /numbers/is-palindrome
api_list.description: Checks whether a given number is a palindrome number or not.

api_list.name: /numbers/prime/is-fermat-prime
api_list.description: Checks whether a given number is a known fermat prime number or not.

api_list.name: /numbers/is-cube
api_list.description: Checks whether a given number is a cube number or not.

api_list.name: /numbers/is-square
api_list.description: Checks whether a given number is a square number or not.

api_list.name: /numbers/is-triangle
api_list.description: Checks whether a given number is a triangle number or not.

api_list.name: /numbers/prime/is-perfect
api_list.description: Checks whether a given number is a perfect number or not.
